body:
Hello, 

Just downloaded ladybug and honeybee and excited to get my teeth into them!  however i seem to have a white space problem with  my user name which is stopping ladybug from 'flying'  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5uACgY*tajvztD4THvDdS-IcGwpoqCJQ3BfVkILMSALqopaOvKT5xK0qCUPN1atcmtssRpwtRVH7U7pfp9*CPYIjQ*GuQn4h/LBHB_Whitespaceerror.jpg)

Im not great with computers so some step by step advice to fix this would be much appreciated. 

thanks in advance!  Ben
